MemoryInfobox.description: 'General Lysander always made a careful study of his enemies. As we're all bound to our character, this skill, above all others, would promise him the upper hand.'

General_Description: '''Know Your Enemy''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After collecting three ''[[polemarch]]'' seals, Kassandra returned to [[Lysander]] in [[Sparta]].
Section_Dialogue:
(Dialogue continues from The Cost of War)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine. I'll kill more for you.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''My soldiers think me bloodthirsty. I know the cost of war. Neither side will be clean of it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your plan is working.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''And the [[Athens|Athenian]] think me battle shy!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That makes you happy?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''I held my army back, so they dropped their guard. And then we ran them aground.''
(If players choose "How goes the war?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So I take it the war is going well for you, then?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Enough questions.''
(If players choose "What will you do if you win?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What will you do if you win?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Enough talk.''
(If players choose "OK. No more questions.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Fine. I won't ask any more questions.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Tell me then, Eagle Bearer, you must be pleased with our progress.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''As you said, tactics will win this.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''When this is over, I'll try my hand at politics.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm sure it'll suit you.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Go then, kill the enemy command. This is our war to win.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll do it, General.''
Kassandra returns to Lysander.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have the seals. Spartan troops have the outpost.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''While you were gone, I oversaw the capture of three thousand. Yet still my men suck their thumbs.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Three thousand prisoners?''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Not anymore. They've been executed. Do you disapprove?''

<tabber>
|-|War is war.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They'd do it to us.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''So we understand one another then.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Perfectly.''
|-|Our actions are our legacy.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Our actions live on long after we're dead.''
Lysander turns infuriated.
*'''Lysander:''' ''Don't you dare lecture me, Eagle Bearer. The gods approve of my actions.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Then I'll leave you to the gods.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''Your Spartan blood boils, does it?''
</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''These seals should provide you ample proof.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''My command on the battlefield has been more than secured.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're welcome.''
*'''Lysander:''' ''We're well-positioned for battle. Troops have been deployed and will control more ground soon. Your efforts were invaluable. I won't forget it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Thank you, General.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Lysander eliminate three Athenian ''polemarchs'' and recover their seals. She was again tasked to retrieve more.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
